Class FilesystemBasedFileImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.file.AbstractFile
      • org.waarp.common.file.filesystembased.FilesystemBasedFileImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonFileImpl, FilesystemBasedFtpFile, R66File

    public abstract class FilesystemBasedFileImpl
extends AbstractFile
    File implementation for Filesystem Based
